charges.charge_disposition: Deft shall make restitution in the amt of $995.00 to the Clerk, U.S. Dist Court, 114 U.S. Courthouse, 1716 Spielbusch Ave, Toledo, OH 43624. Cks to be made payable to Clerk, U.S. Dist Court. Deft shall make 6 monthly pymts of $166.00 w/first pymt due 11/14/98 &; by the 14th of ea succeeding mo until the restitution is pd in full; Disbursement by the Clerk, U.S. Dist Court shall be made to the U.S. Army, 4th Finance Battalion, Fort Carson, CO 80913-5024, Attn: Debt Collection. (-1)
